description.narrative: - Resource Efficiency: Thanks to the environmental and climate friendly benefits of the Project, at optimum capacity after implementation Modern Karton will be able to consume less fresh water and discharge less waste water per paper produced compared to the current levels. - Demonstration Effect: The Project is likely to have strong demonstration and replication potential thanks to being a pioneering investment in the sector.

Modern Karton Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. (Modern Karton or the Company), an existing IFC client since 1998, is engaged in manufacturing of cardboard (i.e., testliner, white-top testliner and fluting) from waste paper and straw pulp since 1998. Being the domestic leader in corrugated paper business, the Company is the flagship company of Eren Group in paper and packaging business with its operating facilities that have 600,000 tons per annum production capacity. This major player in the corrugated paper and cardboard industry in Europe and Middle East is seeking to expand its cooperation with IFC in establishing a waste water recovery system with 15,600 m3/day treatment capacity utilizing ultra filtration and reverse osmosis technologies (the Project).
